properties.name: ChangeDescription
properties.description: The change description of the component.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the component.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags associated with the component.

properties.description: The operating system (OS) version supported by the component.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of the component denotes whether the component is used to build the image or only to test it.

properties.name: Encrypted
properties.description: The encryption status of the component.
